about_the_game:
Welcome to Hell University!
Something seems off as you arrive at Hell University. The students seem uncomfortable, the teachers are agitated, and the dean is being defensive. Explore yet another indie side-scroller as you venture through the Hell University campus, fending off supernatural enemies as you learn more about your fellow students and acquire skills to help you on your journey. Conquer the demons that infest the recesses of Hell University, and save the school from certain doom.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Hell University!
Something seems off as you arrive at Hell University. The students seem uncomfortable, the teachers are agitated, and the dean is being defensive. Explore yet another indie side-scroller as you venture through the Hell University campus, fending off supernatural enemies as you learn more about your fellow students and acquire skills to help you on your journey. Conquer the demons that infest the recesses of Hell University, and save the school from certain doom.
name: Hell University

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: Explore yet another indie metroidvania as you venture through the Hell University campus. Conquer the demons that infest the essence of Hell University, and save the school from certain doom.
